title: Fragment, 14th century
medium:
Medium: silk, metallic
Technique:Lampas;  two interconnected structures. plain weave plus plain weave
description:
A. Head of a long necked bird with a metallic head against a patterned green and brown background.
B. A fragment from the heading or the footing.
